phrases.text: Bập ơ a bập bềnh sóng a nước đêm trăng

culturalContext.description: This phrase features "trăng" - moon - symbol of beauty, longing, passage of time. This narrative phrase advances the story, grounding the emotional content in concrete imagery.
facts: Vietnamese folk songs preserve oral traditions passed down through generations without written notation
Dan Tranh (16-string zither) arrangements of folk songs are relatively modern adaptations of vocal traditions
Many folk songs use nature imagery to express human emotions indirectly
The pentatonic scale used in Vietnamese folk music creates a distinctively Asian sound palette
culturalContext.musicalContext: This narrative phrase contains 10 syllables, longer than typical, allowing for extended melodic development. Narrative phrases typically use moderate melodic range and steady rhythm to advance the story.

phrases.text: Thuyền ơ a băng sóng bạc a lướt dòng cuộn trôi mà trăng in mặt nước sáng ngời

culturalContext.description: This phrase features "trăng" - moon - symbol of beauty, longing, passage of time. This narrative phrase advances the story, grounding the emotional content in concrete imagery.
facts: Vietnamese folk songs preserve oral traditions passed down through generations without written notation

culturalContext.musicalContext: This narrative phrase contains 18 syllables, longer than typical, allowing for extended melodic development. Narrative phrases typically use moderate melodic range and steady rhythm to advance the story.

phrases.text: Tiếng ơ a hò a vang vọng a nước non tâm tình

culturalContext.description: This phrase features "hò" - work song - sung while laboring (rowing, farming, etc.).
facts: Vietnamese folk songs preserve oral traditions passed down through generations without written notation
Dan Tranh (16-string zither) arrangements of folk songs are relatively modern adaptations of vocal traditions
Many folk songs use nature imagery to express human emotions indirectly
The pentatonic scale used in Vietnamese folk music creates a distinctively Asian sound palette
culturalContext.musicalContext: This onomatopoeia phrase contains 12 syllables, longer than typical, allowing for extended melodic development. Onomatopoetic phrases use repeated notes or simple patterns to imitate sounds.

phrases.text: em ước a gì mà rằng có lưới giăng sông

culturalContext.description: This phrase features "Ông" - respectful address for married men. The questioning form invites response or reflection, typical of call-and-response folk traditions.
facts: Vietnamese uses formal address terms even in intimate folk songs, reflecting Confucian respect culture
Vietnamese folk songs preserve oral traditions passed down through generations without written notation
Dan Tranh (16-string zither) arrangements of folk songs are relatively modern adaptations of vocal traditions
Many folk songs use nature imagery to express human emotions indirectly
culturalContext.musicalContext: This question phrase contains 10 syllables, longer than typical, allowing for extended melodic development. Question phrases typically end with rising pitch, mirroring the Vietnamese question intonation.
